thumb.name: Mouse and Star
thumb.verse: Brighten a Christmas gift with a star package decoration and the friendly little mouse companion who%26#146;s sure to bring along a little Christmas cheer!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/B%3EA4 Paper. Preferably heavy cardstock. Scissors. Tape or glue. Black string. Ribbon.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EMake%3C/b%3E text changes as desired.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint%3C/b%3E to send finished Package Decoration%3C/b%3E to the printer.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/b%3E along all solid lines.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut out%3C/b%3E hanging tab on front Star panel along solid line.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPunch%3C/b%3E hole on hanging tab.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECrease%3C/b%3E dashes on front and back panels of Star to form 3-D Star. Printed side out.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EFold%3C/b%3E front Star panel tabs over back Star panel. %3Cb%3ESecure%3C/b%3E with tape or glue.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EAttach%3C/b%3E black string to bottom of Star and back of Mouse.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EThread%3C/b%3E ribbon through the hanging tab for completed %3Cb%3EPackage Decoration.%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAdd glitter paint highlights to the Star.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis decoration would also look great as an ornament.

thumb.name: Christmas Trees
thumb.verse: Complement your traditional. holiday gift-wrap designs with a 3-D. Christmas-tree-scene package decoration that%26#146;s easy and quick to create!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E A4 Paper. Preferably heavy cardstock. Scissors. Tape or glue. Ribbon.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace.%3Cbr%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EMake%3C/b%3E text changes as desired. (Note that project sheet contains two package decorations.)%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint Project%3C/b%3E to send finished %3Cb%3EPackage Decorations%3C/b%3E to the printer.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/b%3E along the solid exterior lines.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPunch%3C/b%3E a hole through the small circle at the top of each package decoration disk.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3ETo assemble the package decoration %3Cb%3Ematch up%3C/b%3E the left side of a disk with the right side of another disk (ensure that holes are aligned at the top). and %3Cb%3Esecure%3C/b%3E together with tape or glue.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EMatch up%3C/b%3E the back two sides of the third disk to the two open sides of the attached disks. %3Cb%3ESecure%3C/b%3E with tape or glue. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ERepeat%3C/b%3E steps #6. and #7 with the three other package decoration disks to create another package decoration.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3EThread%3C/b%3E and tie ribbon through the aligned holes at the top of each package decoration.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAlso makes a cute personalised ornament for someone%26#146;s Christmas tree!
